actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a commemorative postage stamp in observance of the thirtieth anniversary of the founding of the modern State of Israel.

summary.text: Directs the Postal Service to issue a commemorative postage stamp in observance of the thirtieth anniversary of the founding of the modern State of Israel.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the issuance of a commemorative postage stamp in observance of the thirtieth anniversary of the founding of the modern State of Israel.
